title: Lamb tagine with fresh pomegranate
ingredients: ['500g neck of lamb on the bone', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons sweet paprika', '1 teaspoon hot paprika', '1 red onion', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 sweet potato', '2 cloves garlic', '400g chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon honey', '50g sultanas', 'zest and juice of 1/2 lemon', '250ml stock (either chicken or lamb)', '1/2 pomegranate, to serve']
